nccsdata 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    Data Downloads with nccsdata

Function reference

NCCS Data Processing Functions

Functions for downloading, filtering and merging NCCS data sets based on year, form types, NTEE codes and geographic arguments.

get_data()
Function to query bmf data and integrate it with census, cbsa and ntee metadata
validate_get_data()
Function to validate inputs to get_data()
get_core()
Function to get core dataset.
get_bmf()
Function to download master bmf file and filter it based on ntee and FIPS codes
core_file_constructor()
function to construct filenames from aws s3 core bucket
download_size()
Data size calculator.
fips_map()
function that maps fips codes to user arguments
nteecc_map()
This function maps ntee2 codes to ntee.cc codes
obj_validate()
Function to validate constructed file names and return s3 keys

Generate Summary Tables

Functions for calculating summary statistics for processed data, grouped by user-defined columns.

preview_sample()
Function to summarize NCCS data.
validate_preview()
Function to validate inputs to preview_sample()

Explore NTEE Codes

Functions to process, preview and parse NTEE2 codes with user-inputs.

ntee_preview()
Function to document NTEE Codes
parse_ntee()
A complete function takes any user input values from the arguments: ntee.group ntee.code ntee.orgtype And returns the correct list of NTEE codes that match the filter requirements. It will also raise an error if the user tries argument values that are undefined and print an informative message.
generate_ntee_regex()
Script containing helper functions for ntee_main.R
get_ntee_level_3_4()
Function to generate level 3 and 4 of NTEE2 code
parse_ntee_regex()
Function to loop through and execute a vector of regex queries on a vector of ntee codes
query_ntee()
function to match user queries to ntee2 codes
sort_ntee()
Function to sort user ntee inputs into group, code and organization tyoe
validate_inp()
Function to inspect user inputs and flag errors

Explore Census FIPS Codes

Functions to preview and parse FIPS codes from census crosswalks using user-inputs.

parse_geo()
Simplified Geo Parser for Census Crosswalks
parse_fips()
Function that returns FIPS codes that match dynamic User arguments

Utility Functions

dat_filter()
Function to filter data table
dic_from_df()
Function that creates a dictionary from 2 data.frame columns
filter_data()
Function to filter a data.table with user-provided arguments
firstupper()
Function to process first letter of lowercase strings
jsonify_f()
Script with utility functions Function that prettifies json
load_dt()
Function to read csv files from a public s3 bucket url. Saves the file as a data.table.
objs_exist()
Check if ALL objects named one vector exist in memory

Data Sets

tinybmf
Development dataset for testing.
